name: rare-bone
short_effect: Sell for 5000 Pokédollars, or to Bone Man for 10000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A rare bone that is extremely valuable for the study of Pokémon archeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.
